casebody.data:
Donald J. TRUMP, President of the United States, et al., petitioners,
v.
HAWAII, et al. No. 16-1540. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 24, 2017. Further consideration of motion of respondents Hawaii, et al. to add John Doe as a party to No. 16-1540 is deferred to the hearing of the case on the merits.
